Reasoning: The paper deals with combinatorics on words, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The concept of avoidability is also related to formal languages (cs.FL) and information theory (cs.IT). The paper also involves the study of patterns and formulas, which are topics in logic (cs.LO) and computational complexity (cs.CC).
